verbose_text: It was found that ammonia inhibited mitochondrial dehydrogenases activity caused collapse of mitochondrial membrane potential (MMP), induced mitochondrial swelling (MPP), and increased reactive oxygen species (ROS) in isolated liver and brain mitochondria.
